title: MCPC1.6.2服务器架设失败求解
author: whn932141154
txt_content:
bat里面的东西是这样的
@ECHO OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
CD /D "%BINDIR%"
"D:\Java\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar mcpc-plus-1.6.2-R0.1-forge817-B46.jar
